name: Cupid.
description:
Description

Bring together destined lovers by attracting shapes together in this mobile friendly puzzle game!

Controls

You can only have two circles selected at a time.

Left click or tap on a circle to select it, then left click or tap on a reachable lover to join them together.

Left click or tap again on a selected circle to deselect, or right click to deselect all.

Credits

A game by Corben Gilbert and Myles MacDonald.

All assets made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
